td.content: s:a 39 year old white M presents with mild pain radiating from the back to the buttocks. patient also reports mild low back pain. o:Height 165 cm, Weight 52 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, Extremities: no edema, no cyanosis, normal ROM, straight leg test does not increase pain a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Estrogens - 0.3 mg po qd, and ordered CBC, HLA B27, spine XRY.

Value.Value: ordered CBC , HLA B 27 , spine XRY
